Text: Enron Onlineis the info I need for Enron Online Thanks for all your help Molly Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample To Mark nroncom cc PM Subject Enron Online This topic has moved up on the radar screen over here In addition to the issues about setting up the shell corporation what are the rules for the Enron affliliates who trade on line Josie Castrejana in our credit group has talked to Tom Moran in your credit group EOTT is concerned about credit issues for the shell corporation How do you handle that with the other Enron affiliates Who would post letters of credit or guaranties How does the contract get from the Enron affiliate to EOTTis the contract assigned or do we do back to back deals If this is a physical transaction we need to figure out a way to coordinate names on the contract credit invoice ticket etc Also who would nominate the volumes Needless to say we are not finished yet Please let me know when you would be available to go over these issues Thanks so much for your help Molly Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample Sent by To Mark nroncom Autumn cc Dana ott Charles ott Cartier Subject Enron Online PM Please see the attached memo Thank you See attached file mdoc mdoc

Enron Onlinehate to be a pest but this topic is still an issue over here We are in the process of moving but I am told that you and I have spoken many times over the past several months on this issue and the marketing people are curious why we havent resolved this Interesting Your help will be appreciated Thanks Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample To Dana Gibbs cc PM Subject Enron Online Please let me know how hard to push this one Thanks Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample To Dana Gibbs cc PM Subject Enron Online I really need to speak with Mark Taylor about the structure of the shell corporation before we can go any farther on the Enron Online initiative I realize he is busy What is the priority on this to help me get it moved up on his list or atleast find a few minutes to call me back Thanks Molly Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample To cc PM Subject Enron Online Here is the info I need for Enron Online Thanks for all your help Molly Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample To Mark nroncom cc PM
